items.name: clir
items.description: Command-line interface builder in pure R

items.name: TASSEL
items.description: Tools to evaluate trait associations, evolutionary patterns, and linkage disequilibrium.

items.name: PHGv2
items.description: Tools for representing pangenomes and imputation.

items.name: rTASSEL
items.description: An R-based front-end for TASSEL interactivity. Provides seamless integration of TASSEL's powerful genomic analysis tools within R workflows.

items.name: rPHG
items.description: An R-based front-end for the Practical Haplotype Graph. Enables pangenome analysis and imputation workflows in R.

items.name: rPHG2
items.description: An R-based front-end for the Practical Haplotype Graph v2. Enables pangenome analysis and imputation workflows in R.

items.name: MGJars
items.description: An R package for distributing TASSEL and PHG API libraries

items.name: ask4r
items.description: R methods for querying askDB (Andropogoneae Systems Knowledge Database)

items.name: BRIC
items.description: A novel biclustering method for detecting gene regulatory signals (GRSs) within single cells

items.name: quiltr
items.description: Procedural polygon pattern generation for creating generative art in R

items.name: croix
items.description: Color palette generator for R projects

items.name: vidger
items.description: Create rapid visualizations of RNA-Seq data in R. Provides integrative interpretation of differential gene expression results.

items.name: ggDESeq
items.description: A visualization suite for DESeq related data frames that implements ggplot2 aesthetics

items.name: BioKotlin
items.description: A high performance bioinformatics library written in Kotlin. Provides modern, type-safe APIs for genomic data processing.

items.name: BioKotlin Playground
items.description: A compiler server for showcasing BioKotlin API in HTML code blocks. Interactive documentation tool.

items.name: askDB
items.description: Andropogoneae Systems Knowledge Database - a comprehensive database for grass genomics research

items.name: IRIS-EDA
items.description: Integrated RNA-Seq Data Analysis and Interpretation System. Provides interactive visualization and analysis tools for RNA-Seq experiments.

items.name: PerlSeq
items.description: Perl routines for common bioinformatics tasks with FASTA data
